source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a dramatic scenery shot of a storm. Heavy, dark storm clouds hang low over a flat, arid landscape. The scene is ominous, with the massive cloud formation dominating the sky above the thin strip of land at the horizon.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a dramatic scenery shot of a storm. Heavy, dark storm clouds hang low over a flat, arid landscape. The scene is ominous, with the massive cloud formation dominating the sky above the thin strip of land at the horizon.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a flock of birds can be seen flying across the sky during the storm, as this provides additional context about the motion in the scene.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a dramatic scenery shot of a storm. Heavy, dark storm clouds hang low over a flat, arid landscape. The scene is ominous, with the massive cloud formation dominating the sky above the thin strip of land at the horizon. A flock of birds can be seen flying across the sky, adding a sense of motion to the stormy scene.
